title: Daily Crunch: Apple Arcade expands with classic games

title: Extra Crunch roundup: Tonal EC-1, Deliveroo’s rocky IPO, is Substack really worth $650M?
description: This week included a deep dive on Tonal, a look at Substack’s valuation and how-tos on startup hiring and responding to security breaches.
